title: Website Developer $4/hr - Wordpress & No-Code/Low-Code
job_overview:
We’re looking for a creative, tech-savvy Website Developer to help build and optimize internal and client websites. You’ll also assist with SEO audits, on-page improvements, and keyword tracking. This role blends technical work with marketing strategy—perfect for someone who loves building and ranking.

Responsibilities:
Website & Landing Pages:
-Build and edit websites using WordPress, Webflow, or Shopify
-Create landing pages in GoHighLevel or Elementor
-Optimize for speed, mobile responsiveness, schema, and user experience

SEO & Analytics:
-Run audits and fix issues (Google Index, Core Web Vitals, site health)
-Optimize on-page SEO (titles, meta descriptions, headers, alt text, internal linking)
-Build local SEO pages and manage Google Business Profiles
-Track keyword rankings and performance, and provide regular reports

What We’re Looking For:
-Strong skills in WordPress or Webflow
-Experience with SEO tools (Ubersuggest, SurferSEO, Google Search Console, Screaming Frog)
-Familiarity with landing page design, local SEO, and lead funnels

Bonus: Experience with Shopify or print-on-demand stores

Tools You’ll Use:
-WordPress, Webflow, GoHighLevel, Ubersuggest, Canva, SurferSEO, Google Analytics 4, Notion

How to Apply:
Send the following:
-Website or landing page examples you’ve built
-Any SEO dashboards or reports you’ve created

Bonus: Examples of SEO improvements or keyword wins you've achieved
